01.desc: Your screen name has an invalid length, please make sure it matches the one you were given exactly.

02.desc: Your screen name is invalid due to a non-matching checksum value, please make sure it matches the one you were given exactly.

05.desc: The response number that you wish to edit must be an integer greater than 0.

06.desc: Your response must be less than or equal to 120 characters if submitted through the bot. If you wish to submit a response longer than this, please DM me to get it manually vetted.

01.desc: You have previously already signed up for this event.

02.desc:
You have already submitted {} responses, and the limit of responses you can submit is {}, so you cannot submit any more.
To edit your response, type in `{}twowevent respond -edit <response_number_to_edit> <new_response>`.
Example command:`{}respond -edit 1 This will edit your first response to become this.`

03.desc: Only contestants may submit responses at this time, and you are not a contestant.

01.desc: The current status is not voting, so you may not vote right now.

02.desc: Signups have ended, you may not sign up right now.

03.desc: The current status is not responding, so you may not respond right now.

04.desc: You have not submitted a response with response number of {}.
